PHRASE.LANG: 【Drey】ノアールグレイハウンドスタチュー
"It was different to the rest of the gaudy, ostentacious ornaments the old coot had decked his house with. Must have been a gift from a more tasteful relative." [#Legal]
« C'était différent du reste des ornements tapageurs et ostentatoires dont le vieux râleur avait décoré sa maison. Il devait s'agir d'un cadeau offert par un proche ayant plus de goût. » [#Legal]
"Dieses Stück war anders als all die protzigen Gegenstände, die der alte Kauz in seinem Haus angesammelt hat. Es muss ein Geschenk eines Verwandten sein, der Geschmack hat." [#Legal]
"Era diverso da resto degli ornamenti colorati ed esagerati con cui il vecchio sciocco aveva riempito la casa. Forse era un regalo di qualche parente con più gusto". [#Legal]
"Era diferente al resto de adornos ostentosos que llenaban la casa de aquel pobre idiota. Seguramente sería el regalo de algún pariente con gusto." [#Legal]
「際立つ家具。とてもセンスの良い親戚からプレゼントでもらうよう。」 [#Legal]
"It was different to the rest of the gaudy, ostentacious ornaments the old coot had decked his house with. Must have been a gift from a more tasteful relative." [#Legal]
"It was different to the rest of the gaudy, ostentacious ornaments the old coot had decked his house with. Must have been a gift from a more tasteful relative." [#Legal]
